Class: OOTemplate_NodeFor

Source Location: /OOTemplate_Node.php

Class Overview

OOTemplate_Node
   |
   --OOTemplate_NodeFor

Loops over each item in an array.

Methods

  • __construct
  • prepare
  • render

Inherited Methods

Class: OOTemplate_Node

OOTemplate_Node::render()

Class Details

[line 119]
Loops over each item in an array.

  1.     <ul>
  2.     {% for item in list %}
  3.       <li>{{ item }</li>
  4.     {% endfor %}
  5.     </ul>

You can use an imbriqued tags.

  1.     <ul>
  2.     {% for item in list %}
  3.       <li>{{ item }</li>
  4.       {% if item.ss_items %}
  5.       <ul>
  6.         {% for ss_item in item.ss_items %}
  7.           <li>{{ ss_item }</li>
  8.         {% endfor %}
  9.       </ul>
  10.       {% endif %}
  11.     {% endfor %}
  12.     </ul>
